sourcesContent:
# Plat Ingrédients Prix en Ariary Quantité
{{i + 1}} {{dish.name}} {{dish.ingredients}} {{dish.price}}
Total à payer {{totalPrice$ | async}} Ariary
import { BasketService } from './../../basket.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Dish } from '../../types/dish'; @Component({ selector: 'app-content', templateUrl: './content.component.html', styleUrls: ['./content.component.scss'] }) export class ContentComponent implements OnInit { basket$: Observable = this.basketService.basket$; totalPrice$ : Observable = this.basketService.totalPrice$; constructor(private basketService: BasketService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } deleteDish(id: string): void { this.basketService.removeDishinBasket(id); } }
